body_html: sorry to bother you guys, I figured that this only happens when you swap the arguments. Everything works out ok if you do mse_loss(y,x). So if target requires gradient we always sum, intended?

body: sorry to bother you guys, I figured that this only happens when you swap the arguments. Everything works out ok if you do `mse_loss(y,x)`. So if `target` requires gradient we always sum, intended?
